snippet: In the 30 years since his involvement with the F.B.I., the Rev. Al Sharpton has gone from being a belligerent street activist to being a cable-channel host and sometime political candidate.
abstract: Revelations about Rev Al Sharpton's involvement with Federal Bureau of Investigation are not new, but are drawing more attention, coming a few days before he is scheduled to host Pres Obama at the annual convention of his National Action Network; disclosures cast a light on a man whose life has had many chapters and a proximity to power.
lead_paragraph: In the 30 years since his involvement with the F.B.I., the Rev. Al Sharpton has gone from being a belligerent street activist to being a cable-channel host and sometime political candidate.

headline.main: Details of Sharpton’s Time as Informer Shed Light on a Life With Many Chapters
headline.print_headline: Details of Sharpton’s F.B.I. Work Show a Varied Life
